businessModel.description: Core business structure, revenue models, and value propositions
businessModel.organization: Organized by business components and strategic elements
businessModel.purpose: Maintain consistent understanding of the KinOS Ventures business model

verticals.description: Detailed information about each vertical business unit
verticals.organization: Organized by vertical with comprehensive business details
verticals.purpose: Track the development and details of each vertical business

teamStructure.organization: Organized by organizational level and function
teamStructure.purpose: Maintain understanding of organizational design and talent strategy

roadmap.organization: Organized by phase with detailed milestones and objectives
roadmap.purpose: Track strategic plan and development timeline

crossReferences.verticalToBusinessModel: Each vertical connects to the overall business model
crossReferences.roadmapToVerticals: Roadmap includes specific milestones for each vertical
crossReferences.businessModelToRoadmap: Business model evolution is reflected in roadmap phases

maintenanceProtocol.businessModelUpdate: Update when business strategy or revenue models change
maintenanceProtocol.verticalsUpdate: Update when new verticals are added or existing ones evolve
maintenanceProtocol.teamStructureUpdate: Update when organizational design changes or new roles are defined
maintenanceProtocol.roadmapUpdate: Update quarterly to reflect progress and strategic adjustments
